description:
Goku and Vegeta recruit Piccolo and Majin Buu as the remaining combatants of the Universe Seven team. Gohan considered joining the team, but he was unable to do so as he had a business meeting on the day of the tournament. Beerus and the others think back over recent events. A series of flashbacks recapping the series is shown.
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: "Kakutou Shiai" e no Osarai: Nokori Futari no Member wa Dare Da!?
A Review Before the `Martial Arts Match`: Who Are the Last Two Members?!
Ein Rückblick, bevor der Wettkampf beginnt! – Wer sind die restlichen zwei Kämpfer?
『格闘試合』へのおさらい 残り二人のメンバーは誰だ!?
